A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hands down the best Star Wars since Empire Strikes Back. First SW to explore new grounds in narrative\, plot and characters. A necessary risk to bring possibilities to a now larger universe. I recall when audiences WHINED\, shocked to learn Vader was Luke's father\, as usual those same audiences praise ESB now. If you don't like TFA don't complain and stick to Episodes I\, II and III... those are all pre\ndictable enough.
